description: This table contains the information recorded in billing system account contact for each account. Each row in this table contains information about one contact and is uniquely identified by the Account ID and line number combination.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the account record. This ID number could be encrypted if you have elected to implement enterprise reporting�s encryption security function.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line number to identify the account contact information within the account.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date the contact was recorded.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the system user who recorded the contact. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: CONTACT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value associated with the activity performed by collections staff on the account, such as No Contact, Check Mailed, Promised Payment, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Contact


Check Mailed


Promised Payment


Phone Disconnected


Letter


Billing Note


Contacted


Inquiry


Account Put on Hold


Reminder Set


Collections Write-Off Applied


Account Reassigned


Account Status Changed


Account Note Made


Account Completed


Account Transferred In


Account Transferred Out


External Agency Bad Debt Written Off


Account Sent to External Agency


Account Recalled from External Agency


Update Sent to External Agency


Payment Plan


Billing Status


Patient Flag Made


Credit WQ Info


Refund


Credit WQ Transfer


Defer in Credit WQ


Appointment Desk


Registration


Credit WQ Manual Complete


Demand Bill


Customer Relationship Management


Balance Transfer


Dismiss Tickler


Enable Paperless Billing


Disable Paperless Billing


Send Transactions to Agency


Recall Transactions from Agency


Manually Assigned


Remove Payment Plan


Edit Payment Plan


Unlock Pay as Guest


Skip in Account WQ


Defer in Account WQ


Activate in Account WQ

columns.name: TICKLER_DATE
columns.description: The date the account should be contacted again.

columns.name: LETTER_NUMBER
columns.description: The letter number of the letter associated with this guarantor.

columns.name: REFUND_REQ_ID
columns.description: Stores payment transaction numbers of a refund request for the Account Contact activity.

columns.name: REFUND_REQ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the refund request status associated with the Account Contact activity.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Requested


Reviewed


Approved


Declined


Posted

columns.name: REFUND_REQ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of the refund request associated with the activity.

columns.name: PAYMENT_TXS
columns.description: A comma-delimited list of follow-up transactions.

columns.name: FOL_UP_CUR_INS_BAL
columns.description: Follow-up current insurance balance.

columns.name: FOL_UP_CUR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Follow-up current patient balance.

columns.name: FOL_UP_ACT_INFO
columns.description: This item stores the activity info to be displayed in account contact.

columns.name: LETTER_SUMMARY
columns.description: A short summary of the letter that was sent to the patient. This can be customized by your organization, and may include information like the patient's name, address and balance.

columns.name: LETTER_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The letter status category ID for the guarantor, for example "queued" or "sent".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not yet printed


Queued


Printed


Sent


Rejected


Purged


Hidden

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the note associated with this contact.

columns.name: FOL_UP_HX_CRM_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for an customer service record that is related to the guarantor.

columns.name: FOL_UP_NOTE
columns.description: Each guarantor account may have a follow-up note posted to it per contact. This column holds either a system generated or custom note that further describes the contact, if a note was produced.

columns.name: LETTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the letter.

columns.name: PAPERLESS_UPD_WHY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for updating the guarantor's MyChart paperless billing status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
